titles: My heartbeat was touching 200 in the last over: Varun Chakravarthy after heroics vs Sunrisers Hyderabad

titles: Earthquake bamboo bars and weighted jackets: Inside weightlifter Mirabai Chanu’s backbreaking workout routine
